body:
• Map - execute a function over a set of data
  • Reduce - take the results of the map phase and combine them into a single result
  • Any node can coordinate the M/R job and send map-step eval requests to nodes where the data lives
  • Reduce steps are done on the coordinating node
  • M/R phases can be written in JS or Erlang
  • Map inputs can be
    • Bucket name
    • Bucket and Key
    • Bucket, Key and arg
  • Way more detail, not enough time!
